评论详情: This was a simple and cute summer outfit I wore to Florida for vacation and visiting family. I got a lot of compliments on it and the fabric kept me cool in the Florida heat. If you need something easy, cute, light weight, and stylish for the summer or hot weather. This is a no brainer.
Didn’t meet my expectations

I originally bought this set to wear during a brief Caribbean (Montego Bay) vacation.  However, I didn't get to wear it as planned and later wore it (with an orange tank top & wide belt) on one of my errand days around town.  Received tons of compliments from absolute strangers!
This runs a little small. Shorts were too short.
Super cute and comfy!

This has a total shower curtain material feeling. And to get it ironed out must be a pain but I didn't get that far after how it felt and looked. Wasn't at all flattering. The material is so cheap that it didn't justify keeping it.
Uncomfortable when sitting
I felt so beautiful and sexy. It fit perfectly. Definitely glad I bought this one.

评论概述: Cute tiny shorts and not true to size
评论详情: This product was very cute and comfortable but, the shorts are more like booty shorts or shorts you'd wear to lounge or sleep in. The material doesn't have much give/stretch but in the waist. I'm about 275 lbs and 5'5 with a big butt and hips and smaller waist. I ordered the 3x, and I can usually fit between a 2x-3x in most clothing. I can fit the shorts but I can tell they would rip or tear easy. Ordered outfit for a trip, thinking about reordering the 4x but may just return. The top fit pretty good though, and covered the tiny shorts and big butt good. Love that the tiny shorts have pockets that you can actually put your hands in too. Very breathable and light weight.

This is a cute outfit, you can dress it up or dress it down. I am 5’1, 195lbs. I got a X-large and believe a large would have fit me a little better. I recommend For ladies who wanna show a little skin, but not too much.
Easy to wash
This was fabulous for a cruise I was just on. Loved it.
I actually wore the shorts without the cover and used the cover for another outfit. It fit great, looked good. I’m 234 lbs, thick and this fit well.
Color was a very bright orange in person and the fabric felt like plastic. Do not recommend
Outfit super comfortable and cute!!!

This fit and feel of this outfit was nice. The kimono was flowing in the wind.. it was roomy around the arm area but not too wide. It was a little bit too long but it was cool. The shorts on the other hand fit great but was definitely a little too short! Lol.. these thighs stayed eating them up🤣.
Looked like pajamas

评论概述: Would give no stars if I could
评论详情: Really was looking forward to wearing this outfit. Received the strangest piece of sewn up fabric I had ever seen. Returned and will not be trying to replace. Very disappointing.
Good quality, the cut is a little different from the photo (sleeves shorter), but worth it
I got so many compliments on this 2 piece set. I styled with a bodysuit and it looked super cute. I am 5’6” 200lbs purchased XL
Order came in a clear zip-lock kind of bag. It was missing the shorts.
wore this outfit for a brunch in Miami. it was so cute when in South Beach. light weight, silky, nice colors. The shorts were a little short but comfortable.
Quality was way better than I expected and the fit was perfect. Got many compliments!
It was so cute I got compliments on it. Perfect for going out. It was light and felt great. I wore it with a bodysuit under as a top.
Loved this; nice colors, felt good on with silk material; fits well!

I normally don’t leave reviews on clothes, but if you are doubting that this will be a good purchase, doubt no longer! This outfit was flattering fit well. The colors were vibrant. Just absolutely loved it. I got so many compliments wearing this outfit to my husband‘s 50th birthday party! Buy this said you won’t be disappointed. The only downside was my shorts were a little big but other than that great outfit.
This is so soft, it’s comfy, I’ll will be buying again
I stepped out of my comfort zone ordering this. I took it on an 8 day cruise and it did not disappoint! I could have gone with a large,but the large plus worked too. I'm 5'2 and 170lbs.
Stretchy, cute and flattering, love it, will be buying more for sure !
Very cute outfit, but the shorts were not the greatest for thick thighs!
So cute, great for summer months as the material is cool. The shorts were too short for me though.
Love the design and it's made well. It does run big.  Size down 1 size for a more fitted look.

This was a cute and pretty comfy set. It's not the best material to be out and about in the sun being that it will definitely stick to you if you sweat any. But it was perfect for a cool day at the beach.
This is just as cute in person. I did size up due to the material. The shorts fit very well and are just the right length. I paired it with a white top just like the picture.
This was all that I hoped it would be! Love the thick waistband on the shorts. I received lots of compliments on vacation! Quality was great and not at all too thin or sheer.
I love the boho look.  The shorts are a bit to short and ride up a little, love the duster, will more than likely wear the duster with cute jean shorts or capris, not sure about the shorts.
Had to return it runs to big definitely go true to size
Love this outfit. Comfortable and true to size got a Large and I’m size 12 in jeans. I’m 200lbs

Overall, this set is very cute. The colors are vibrant and looks exactly as advertised. I returned the set because the shorts did not fit as well as the top piece. I would size up on the shorts if possible.

I ordered this in the "pink printed" because I absolutely love the print (and pink!). To be honest, I do not wear shorts, but I liked this kimono so much that I ordered the set any way. I can wear it with jeans casually, and I can even wear it in the summer when I go to the beach. It is good quality. I love it.
I was using this as a lounge set rather than an outside look since it isn’t hot yet where I am. I love the look itself and wish the top came with it but I am far from displeased.

类型: Size: XX-Large PlusColor: Dusty Blue Printed
评论详情: I bought this for my birthday trip in 9 days. Tried it on and immediately transported to DR. This is such a cute outfit. It's light, bright, and very well made. I can't wait to wear it.  The pockets are an added bonus, I might add. I ordered a XXL bc I'm bottom heavy. At 5'10, 235 lbs I usually wear a 14/16, L/XL depending on the cut. This fits nicely over my curves. I did however, have to flip the waist in the front just a bit to prevent the baggy crotch look, but it fits perfect on my bum and the top is so flowy (yes I said that) and elegant. The material is not too thick but far from see through. Not at all cheaply made.  I love how this outfit looks in general, even moreso when I put it on. It's so cute & classy. Can be dressed down, worn with fashionable sneakers or sandals. It can also be dressed up, and worn with a dressy sandal, wedge, or heeled shoe. Definitely a must buy.
I loved this set. It fits true to size and is very comfortable. It gave rich auntie vibes. I wore this to Brunch and it was perfect
I am 5'6" & weigh 215lbs. Got a 2X which fits perfect. The shorts & robe are the items you receive..not the white top. But I have plenty of tops to sleep in. Very unique & glad I bought!
